message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you still get a decent amount.  Accept and we're done!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer ensures we both benefit significantly. Don't let inflation eat away at our potential gains!
Okay, Bob. I see you want a bigger piece of the pie. Let's split it more evenly. Accept this and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, time is running out and inflation is hurting us both. This is my final offer - let's be practical and end this here.
